entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: -18.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
